QuestData.Title: Follow Me
QuestData.Description:
Assuming the others are in position, we are prepared to steal the necropolis.
You and I must push forward to rendezvous with Ansid. Khaliiq will regroup with Vyn once their tasks are complete.
Come along, $p, and stay near. I will shroud the both of us in shadow, so long as you are at my side.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Navigator Xennir to the rendezvous point.
QuestData.RewardText: It seems we've been discovered. Times like these demand flexibility.
